input.name: __VIEWSTATE

strong.span: Governer Dewine has shut down in-person learning for the rest of the 2019-2020 year. Remote learning will still take place through the late May closing of our year unless the BOE decides differently.
We will be working to continue planning for the rest of this year and start the planning for Fall 2020.

span.text-node: Stay in contact and via our Social Media platforms to remain informed about the changes that are upon us.
Thank you for your continious support!

div.span: Parents and the Physician must both complete this forma and return it to school in order for school personnel to administer either prescription or non-prescription medication to students.

ul.li: Over 2,500 students in grades pre K-12 attend our five Schools
10th largest school district in Montgomery County
Full-day Kindergarten and Half Day Preschool
Our Pre-K through 8th grade students have a uniform dress code
Conveniently located in Trotwood, Ohio near I-70 & I-75
Located in proximity to a large metropolitan area
Just minutes away from the city of Dayton, several universities and more.
Established partnership with Miami Valley Hospital.
A select district working in partnership with Wright State University
